text:
The Mom actress, 40, and cinematographer Michael Barrett, 47, were spotted in Venice, Italy on Wednesday after flying out of Los Angeles’ LAX airport arm-in-arm over the weekend.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

Faris and Barrett enjoyed a bundled-up ride on a water taxi as they took in the views of the romantic city. The cinematographer even sweetly wrapped his arm around the actress during the ride. The two have been spending time together since September after working on the new film Overboard. They were first spotted together early that month.

Anna Faris and new boyfriend Michael Barrett spotted in Venice Credit: Splash News

“Anna has been hanging out with Michael for weeks,” a source told PEOPLE at the time. “They were hanging out occasionally in September, but started seeing each other more frequently recently.”

Anna Faris and new boyfriend Michael Barrett spotted in Venice Credit: Splash News

The cinematographer is the first man Faris has been publicly seen with since splitting from Chris Pratt in August after eight years of marriage. Faris and Barrett were seen on several dinner dates in October, stepping out twice in the span of two days at Modo Mio, an upscale Italian restaurant in the Los Angeles neighborhood of Pacific Palisades.

WATCH: Anna Faris Says Ex Chris Pratt ‘Still Cracks Me Up All the Time’

Faris opened up about her separation from Pratt to PEOPLE in October, saying, “We’ll always have each other and be incredible friends.”

“There is still so much laughter in our lives together, and he is so proud of me, still,” she added at the time. “We watched each other grow, and he still cracks me up all the time. And I think I crack him up — unless he’s a really good actor and great at faking laughter.”

The actress also opened up about the public reaction to their split, which lamented their breakup.
title: Is it Love? Anna Faris Tours Venice with Michael Barrett on Romantic Water Taxi Ride

meta_data.description: Anna Faris and Michael Barrett were spotted on a water taxi in Venice
